description:
Feature: To test all the feature of manage admins page
  As an user of the application
  I want to test various functionalities of Manage Admins page
name: To test all the feature of manage admins page

elements.description:
Description for 1) loginSuccess - To verify the successful login to the application with DATA Login_Success
Input Data: [[aditya.yadav@sakhatech.com, Welcome@123], []]
elements.name:
1) loginSuccess - To verify the successful login to the application with DATA Login_Success
Input Data: [[aditya.yadav@sakhatech.com, Welcome@123], []]

steps.name: 1. Given I am ON home page
2. When I CLICK login link
3. Then I am ON login page
4. And I ENTER valid login details
5. And I SUBMIT the form
6. Then I am ON dashboard page

elements.description:
Description for 1) To change the privilages of an Admin and verify that the privilages are changed changed accrodingly with DATA AddAdmins_Success
Input Data: [[Rohit, Kumar, Singh, rohit.kumar@test.com, 0, Welcome@123, Welcome@123, 0, 1], [success_message]]
elements.name:
1) To change the privilages of an Admin and verify that the privilages are changed changed accrodingly with DATA AddAdmins_Success
Input Data: [[Rohit, Kumar, Singh, rohit.kumar@test.com, 0, Welcome@123, Welcome@123, 0, 1], [success_message]]

steps.name: 1. Given I am ON dashboard page
2. When I CLICK leftMenuButton link
3. And I CLICK manageAdmins link
4. Then I am ON manageAdmins page
5. When I CLICK addAdmin button
6. Then I am ON addAdmin page
7. And I ENTER all the required fields with DATA AddAdmins_Success
8. When I SUBMIT the form
9. Then I am ON manageAdmins page
10. And I CLICK lastOfItemsPerPage link which displays all the admins created in a single page
11. And I VERIFY addedAdminDisplayed
12. Then I am ON manageAdmins page
13. When I PERFORM clickOnNewAdminChangePrivilage link
14. Then I am ON changePrivilages page
15. Then I ENTER valid details with DATA ChangePrivilages_Success
16. Then I SUBMIT the form
17. Then I am ON manageAdmins page
18. When I PERFORM logOut action
19. Then I am ON home page
20. When I CLICK login link
21. Then I am ON login page
22. When I PERFORM loginAsAnAdmin
23. Then I am ON changePassword page
24. And I ENTER valid password details with DATA ChangePassPrivilage_Success
25. Then I SUBMIT the form
26. And I am ON dashboard page
27. When I PERFORM adminPrivilageChanged
28. Then the privilege for admin are changed accrodingly
